data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What is something that you have worked hard to be good at? What makes you want to be good at this thing? How do you stay motivated, especially when you are tired or not sure about the outcome?
data.answer: I worked so hard on Math to be good at it. I am eager to be good at Math is because I think Math is fundamental to all Science, Technology, and Engineering related fields. However, learning Math truly requires logical thinking talent and a lot of practice, sometimes I try so hard but cannot make any processes. This would always result in exhaustion and depression. In that case, I would just read stories of Mathematicians such as Archimedes' stories or Euclid's stories to keep myself motivated.
